response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $10,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to extend an exclusive offer for you. I propose to sell the product to you for $9,500. This is a special opportunity tailored for you, aiming to provide you with significant savings while ensuring you receive the best value for your investment. I believe this offer will allow us both to achieve our goals and make this a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
